r.d: The Config package provides methods for configuration manipulation. * Creates configurations from scratch * Parses and outputs different formats (XML, PHP, INI, Apache...) * Edits existing configurations * Converts configurations to other formats * Allows manipulation of sections, comments, directives... * Parses configurations into a tree structure * Provides XPath like access to directives
r.n: * Fixed bug #1633 related to case-sensitivity of method names in PHP4. causing PHPArray container not to work correctly. See also #1556. Patch provided by m at tacker dotorg.
